articles.title: OPPO Find X7 design revealed, confirms 2 (!) periscope cameras and alert slider - Android Authority
articles.description: OPPO has posted a video showing off the Find X7 series design, confirming two periscope cameras and an alert slider.
articles.content:
• OPPO has posted a video showing the Find X7 series from a variety of angles.
  • The clip confirms the design and a few features, such as an alert slider and two periscope cameras.
